attributes.action: Restore access to the NHS mail service using IMAP across third-party broadband connections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NHS Mail is the messaging system that the Government would like its NHS employees to use. To encourage them in this activity, NHS Trusts are instructed to block access to other messaging systems (Google, Yahoo etc). Fair enough, we don't want employees wasting time on the computer when they should be looking after patients.
But now that Microsoft are in charge of the project, access to our mailboxes when we *aren't* at work has been curtailed severely.
Let us work from home when we need to. Force Microsoft to support non-Microsoft products and Operating Systems or give the contract to someone who will respect the views and needs of NHS workers. Don't believe the propaganda - NHS Mail is failing. Help us save it and give it back to the workers !
